resources.string: Icon edited from Good Ware\'s vector
Temperature data was provided by Goddard Institute for Space Studies
CO2 data was provided by NOAA Global Monitoring Laboratory [Ed Dlugokencky and Pieter Tans]
Arctic ice surface data was provided by National Snow and Ice Data Center [NSIDC/NASA]
The visualization of the data was made possible by MPAndroidChart library by Philipp Jahoda.
